## Load libraries

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

## Load data

```{r}
#| echo: false
biopsy <- read_csv("https://wilkelab.org/classes/SDS348/data_sets/biopsy.csv")
```

## Emily

```{r}
head(biopsy)
```

Clump Thickness vs Bare Nuclei by Outcome

```{r}

ggplot(biopsy, aes(x = clump_thickness, y = bare_nuclei, color = outcome)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7, size = 3) +
  labs(
    title = "Clump Thickness vs Bare Nuclei by Outcome",
    x = "Clump Thickness",
    y = "Bare Nuclei"
  )
```
